Freelancer.name: Freelancer
Freelancer.jobText: Reminiscences of journeys just begun and those long ended embody the freelancer's myriad supportive techniques.

Occult Treasuresight.name: Occult Treasuresight
Occult Treasuresight.description: Detects the number of treasure coffers presently on the Occult Crescent.

Knight.name: Knight
Knight.jobText: Emulate these ancient memories of a loyal, honorable knight and defend your comrades from harm.

Monk.name: Monk
Monk.jobText: These memories of a monk's unflinching discipline and quiet meditation offer a path to unparalleled combat mastery.

Phantom Kick.name: Phantom Kick
Phantom Kick.description:
Leap towards your target, delivering an attack with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Potency scales with item level.
Additional Effect: Grants a stack of Phantom Kick up to a maximum of 3, increasing damage dealt by 5%.
Level 4: Potency increases to 7%.
Level 6: Potency increases to 9%.

Time Mage.name: Time Mage
Time Mage.unlockGuide: Purchase - Time Mage's Soul Shard - 1,000 Silver Pieces from the Expedition Antiquarian.

Bard.name: Bard
Bard.jobText: These memories echo with the vivid imagery of a bard's uplifting song. Utilize them to employ the very same ballads in battle.

Geomancer.name: Geomancer
Geomancer.unlockGuide: Purchase - Geomancer's Soul Shard - 1,600 Gold Pieces from the Expedition Antiquarian.

Chemist.name: Chemist
Chemist.unlockGuide: Purchase - Chemist's Soul Shard - 1,000 Silver Pieces from the Expedition Antiquarian.

Cannoneer.name: Cannoneer
Cannoneer.unlockGuide: Purchase - Cannoneer's Soul Shard - 1,000 Silver Pieces from the Expedition Antiquarian.
Cannoneer.jobText: A mastery of ballistics both scholarly and practical infuse this cannoneer's recollections. Emulate them to bombard foes with powerful projectiles.

Phantom Fire.name: Phantom Fire
Phantom Fire.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 210 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Potency scales with item level.

enhancements.effect: Grants a 5% chance to instantly kill targets when executing Phantom Fire, with some exceptions.

Holy Cannon.name: Holy Cannon
Holy Cannon.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 210 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Potency increases to 500 when used against undead enemies.
Potency scales with item level.

Dark Cannon.name: Dark Cannon
Dark Cannon.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 210 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Potency scales with item level.
Additional Effect: Blind

Shock Cannon.name: Shock Cannon
Shock Cannon.description:
Deals lightning damage with a potency of 210 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Potency scales with item level.
Additional Effect: Paralysis
Shares a recast timer with Dark Cannon.

Silver Cannon.name: Silver Cannon
Silver Cannon.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 210 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Potency scales with item level.
Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Silver Sickness, reducing damage target deals by 10% and increasing damage taken by 5%.
Shares a recast timer with Holy Cannon.

Samurai.name: Samurai
Samurai.unlockGuide: Purchase - Samurai's Soul Shard - 1,600 Gold Pieces from the Expedition Antiquarian.

Thief.name: Thief
Thief.unlockGuide: Purchase - Thief's Soul Shard - 1,600 Gold Pieces from the Expedition Antiquarian.
